name: Simple Breakout (CTN Phaco)
description:
Simple Breakout, a revisited classic, but not so classic:
Break bricks with the paddle and the ball... And see what happens!

WARNING:

Click the game window on the top of the page and use the arrow keys or the D Pad to navigate in the menu or it'll scroll down on this web page!

Content suited to any age.

CONTROLS:

Move PaddleGAMEPAD Left Stick     |    KEYBOARD Left / Right Arrow keys OR WASD OR ZQSD
Launch Ball
Space

Supported Languages:

          

Credits:

This game  was created by CTN Phaco.

If you want more information about licenses contained in this game, read the credits menu in the game itself.

Let's smash some bricks!
